channel.title: Application for Staff on Any Server!
channel.description:
Hello fellow Private Server Players,
If anyone is in need of a staff member such as mod, admin, co-owner etc.. I am just letting you know that i am here to help!
I would love the opportunity to help fellow runescapers out by offering my service as staff.
You can contact me by messaging me here on the forums, username: archerfreek1
OR
Email me @ jackb1996@hotmail.ca
- Thank You, Jack

item.title: Application for Staff on Any Server!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Im here and im free to staff

Find advertisements with people looking for staff. You won’t get an answer here, and we don’t allow requests.

Read full topic
item.source: Application for Staff on Any Server!
